ValidationRule.description: Passport Number mandatory when Nationality is other than Indian
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Record_Type_Name__c = "Student", NOT(ISPICKVAL( Nationality__c ,'Indian')), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Nationality__c))), ISBLANK( Passport_Number__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Passport Number is mandatory if Nationality is other than Indian
